rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure how you'd like the current naturalisation rules to change or to whom you want the changes to apply.

You can find out more about the current eligibility rules and application processes here:

https://www.gov.uk/apply-citizenship-indefinite-leave-to-remain/how-to-apply 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
